1.text: Loop your middle, ring, and pinky finger around the handle so they’re directly behind the blade.

2.text: Pinch the base of the blade with your thumb and index finger.

3.text: Squeeze the handle firmly so the knife doesn’t move around.

4.text: Keep the blade pointed down while you’re carrying it.

5.text: Curl the fingers on your non-dominant hand into a claw.

6.text: Rest your fingertips on the food you’re cutting.

7.text: Press the side of the blade against your knuckles.

8.text: Rock the knife blade forward to cut through the ingredient.

9.text: Move your guide hand backward as you’re cutting.

10.text: Place your guide hand on top of the blade’s tip if you’re mincing.
